Verses: 1 israveludaiya Moopparil Silar Ennidaththil Vandhu, Enakku Munbaaga Utkaarndhaargal.
2 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

3 manupuththirane, Indha Manushar Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaith Thangal Irudhayaththinmel Naatti, Thangal Akkiramamaagiya Idaralaith Thangal Mugaththukku Edhiraaga Vaiththukkondirukkiraargale; Ivargal Ennidaththil Visaarikkaththagumaa?

4 aagaiyaal, Nee Avargalode Pesichchollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Vamsaththaaril Thannudaiya Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaith Than Irudhayaththinmel Naatti, Than Akkiramamaagiya Idaralaith Than Mugaththukku Edhiraaga Vaiththukkondirukkira Evanaagilum Theerkkadharisiyinidaththil Vandhaal,karththaraagiya Naan Isravel Vamsaththaarudaiya Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhaip Pidikkumpadiyaaga Appadippattavanudaiya Naragalaana Vikkiragangalin Thiratchikkuththakkadhaaga Uththaravu Koduppen.
5 avargal Ellaarum Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaip Pinpatri, Ennaivittup Pedhaliththupponaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

6 aagaiyaal, Nee Isravel Vamsaththaarai Nokki: Thirumbungal, Ungal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalai Vittuth Thirumbungal; Ungal Sagala Aruvaruppugalaiyum Vittu Ungal Mugangalaith Thiruppungal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

7 isravel Vamsaththaarilum Isravelil Thangugira Anniyarilum Ennaip Pinpatraamal Pedhaliththu, Than Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaith Than Irudhayaththinmel Naatti, Than Akkiramamaagiya Idaralaith Than Mugaththukkedhiraaga Vaiththukkondirukkira Evanaagilum Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaai Ennidaththil Visaarikka Vandhaal, Avanukkuk Karththaraagiya Naane Uththaravukoduththu,

8 andha Manushanukku Virodhamaaga En Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avanai Adaiyaalamaagavum Pazhamozhiyaagavum Vaiththu, Avanai En Janaththin Naduvil Iraadhapadikku Sangariththuppoduven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.

9 oru Theerkkadharisi Eththappattu Oru Viseshaththai Sonnaanaagil, Appadikkoththa Theerkkadharisiyaik Karththaraagiya Naane Eththappadappanninen; Naan Avanukku Virodhamaaga En Kaiyai Neetti, Avanai Isravel Janaththin Naduvil Iraadhapadikku Azhippen.
10 appadiye Avaravar Thangal Thangal Akkiramaththai Sumappaargal; Theerkkadharisiyinidaththil Visaarikkiravanudaiya Thandanai Eppadiyo Appadiye Theerkkadharisiyinudaiya Thandanaiyum Irukkum.

11 isravel Vamsaththaar Ini Ennaivittu Vazhithappippogaamalum, Thangal Ellaa Meerudhalgalaalum Ini Asusippadaamalum Irukkum Poruttaaga Ippadi Sambavikkum; Appozhudhu Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
12 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi Avar:

13 manupuththirane, Oru Dhesam Enakku Virodhamaai Dhrogampannikkondeyirundhu, Paavancheydhaal, Naan Adharku Virodhamaaga En Kaiyai Neetti, Adhil Appam Ennum Aadharavukolai Muriththu, Adhil Panjaththai Anuppi, Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Adhil Iraadhapadikku Naasampannuven.

14 appozhudhu Novaa, Dhaaniyel, Yobu Aagiya Immoondru Purusharum Adhin Naduvil Irundhaalum, Avargal Thangal Needhiyinaal Thangal Aaththumaakkalaimaaththiram Thappuvippaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
15 naan Dhesaththil Dhushtamirugangalai Anuppa, Ammirugangalinimiththam Oruvarum Adhin Vazhiyaai Nadakkak Koodaadhapadi Verumaiyum Paazhumaagumpodhu,

16 andha Moondru Purusharum Adhin Naduvil Irundhaalum, Thaangalmaaththiram Thappuvaargaleyallaamal, Kumaararaiyaagilum Kumaaraththigalaiyaagilum Thappuvikkamaattaargal; Dhesamum Paazhaaippogum Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Enbadhaik Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
17 alladhu Naan Andha Dhesaththinmel Pattayaththai Varappanni: Pattayame, Dhesaththai Uruvappo Endru Solli, Adhilulla Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Naasampannumpodhu,

18 andha Moondru Purusharum Adhin Naduvil Irundhaalum, Thaangalmaaththiram Thappuvaargaleyallaamal, Kumaararaiyaagilum Kumaaraththigalaiyaagilum Thappuvikkamaattaargal; Dhesamum Paazhaaippogum Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Enbadhaik Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
19 alladhu Naan Andha Dhesaththil Kollainoyai Anuppi, Adhilulla Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Naasampannumpadi Adhinmel Raththappazhiyaaga En Ukkiraththai Ootrumpodhu,

20 novaavum Dhaaniyelum Yobum Adhin Naduvil Irundhaalum, Avargal Thangal Needhiyinaal Thangal Aaththumaakkalai Maaththiram Thappuvippaargaleyallaamal, Kumaaranaiyaagilum Kumaaraththigalaiyaagilum Thappuvikkamaattaargal Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Enbadhaik Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

21 aagaiyaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Naan Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Naasampannumpadi Erusalemukku Virodhamaagap Pattayam, Panjam, Dhushtamirugangal, Kollainoi Ennum Innaangu Kodiya Thandanaigalaiyum Anuppumpodhu Evvalavu Adhiga Sangaaramaagum?

22 aagilum, Idho, Adhile Thappi Meedhiyaagi Veliye Konduvarappadugira Kumaararum Kumaaraththigalum Silar Iruppaargal; Idho, Avargal Ungalandaikkup Purappattu Varuvaargal; Appozhudhu Neengal Avargal Maarkkaththaiyum Avargal Kiriyaigalaiyum Kandu, Naan Erusalemin Mel Varappannina Theengaiyum Adhin Mel Naan Varappannina Ellaavatraiyunkuriththuth Thetrappaduveergal.

23 neengal Avargal Maarkkaththaiyum Avargal Kiriyaiyaiyum Kaanumpodhu, Avargal Ungalukkuth Thetraravaayiruppaargal; Naan Adhile Seydha Ellaavatraiyum Mugaandharamillaamal Seyyavillaiyendru Appozhudhu Arindhukolveergal Enbadhaik Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sonnaar.
